text: The 2022–23 season is the 90th season for the Austrian football club FC Red Bull Salzburg and the club's 34th consecutive season in the top league of Austrian football. Salzburg also participated in this season's editions of the Austrian Cup and the UEFA Champions League. The title was the 10th in a row. ==Squad== 2022/2023 * Goalkeeperss:33 Alexander Walke, 18 Philipp Köhn , 40 Adam Stejskal * Defenders: 2 Ignace Van der Brempt, 3 Bryan Okoh, 95 Bernardo, 17 Andreas Ulmer, 22 Oumar Solet, 5 Jerome Onguene 6 Samson Baidoo, 70 Amar Dedic, 31 Strahinja Pavlovic, 29 Daouda Guindo * Midfielders: 14 Maurits Kjaergaard, 21 Luka Sucic, 13 Nicolas Seiwald, 8 Dijon Kameri,27 Lucas Gourna- Douath, 36 Justin Omoregie, 44 Samson Tijani, 32 Amankwah Forson, 39 Oscar Gloukh * Forwards: 20 Sekou Koita, 9 Junior Adamu, 30 Benjamin Sesko, 11 Fernando, 19 Karim Konate, 77 Noah Okafor * Matthias Jaissle (Coach), Florens Koch, Alexander Hauser (Assistance coaches), Herbert Ilsanker (Goalkeeper coach) ==Matches== Austria Soccer ==Champion group== ==Final table== Pl.
